version_description:
* You can now apply strikes to the followers of your channels and communities.
Leave us a comment to let us know what you think of #Sparkle. This way, we can improve your experience even more! :)
If you need any help, email us at support@sparkleapp.com.br

* You can now apply strikes to the followers of your channels and communities.
Leave us a comment to let us know what you think of #Sparkle. This way, we can improve your experience even more! :)
If you need any help, email us at support@sparkleapp.com.br

* Agora você tem a possibilidade de aplicar advertências para os seguidores do seus canais ou comunidades.
Deixe um comentário para nos contar o que você está achando do #Sparkle. Assim, podemos melhorar a sua experiência cada vez mais!
Se precisar de ajuda, mande um e-mail para: support@sparkleapp.com.br

* Agora é possível responder comentários nas publicações e visualizar o histórico da conversa.
Deixe um comentário para nos contar o que você está achando do #Sparkle. Assim, podemos melhorar a sua experiência cada vez mais!
Se precisar de ajuda, mande um e-mail para: support@sparkleapp.com.br

* Agora é possível responder comentários nas publicações e visualizar o histórico da conversa.

Comentários agora podem conter diversos tipos de mídia.
Agora é possível importar áudios no Sparkle a partir da sua própria galeria!
Deixe um comentário para nos contar o que você está achando do #Sparkle. Assim, podemos melhorar a sua experiência cada vez mais!
Se precisar de ajuda, mande um e-mail para: support@sparkleapp.com.br

Melhoramos sua experiência redesenhando a visualização e criação de comunidades. Ah fizemos algumas melhorias nos sparks de vídeo também, não deixem de conferir.

* We've redesigned the visualization and creation of communities.
* Improvements on video sparks.
* General improvements and corrections.

Leave us a comment to tell us what you think of #Sparkle so we can improve your experience even further!
If you need any help, email us at support@sparkleapp.com.br

* New post experience.
* Bug fixes.
* Download Fixes.
* Fixes for bluetooth devices.

Leave us a comment to tell us what you think of #Sparkle so we can improve your experience even further!
If you need any help, email us at support@sparkleapp.com.br

We’re working hard to make the app even better for you to teach, learn, and start your online business on your own terms.

Easier, faster, and focused on what you want to learn:
The Products area has been redesigned. Now it loads faster, displays the most relevant information for your learning experience, and it’s easier to access additional content.

From the small to the big screen in one click:
There’s nothing better than watching the video lessons of your course on your TV, right? That's why, in this update, we have improved the screen mirroring feature on devices such as Chromecast, Apple TV, and Smart TVs compatible with AirPlay.
Additionally, the new player in the Products area makes screen sharing faster and more stable, improving your learning experience.

Update your app now, and enjoy!

Improvements and bug fixes:

We fixed an error that could close the application after downloading videos when trying to access a course in the Product menu. Now, you can access the content anytime and continue your studies wherever you are.

We’re working hard to make the app even better for you to teach, learn, and start your online business on your own terms.

Easier, more targeted access
We make our login and registration process easier and more targeted to help you when accessing the app.

Your experience will get even better
We have made advances in the course screen to facilitate your access to content more quickly.

In addition we made general corrections and improvements to the app.

Update your app now, and enjoy!

We are working to make the app even better for you to teach, learn and undertake online your way.

In this version, we made improvements, evolutions and adjustments to the new login and registration process, we further evolved our welcome process and access to the general content of the app.

Update your app now and enjoy!

Leave a comment to tell us what you think of #Sparkle. So, we can improve your experience even more! If you need help, send an email to: support@sparkleapp.com.br
